New Records: Domantas Sabonis broke the record for most rebounds in a game at the Celtics since Kareem Abdul-Jabbar in 1971 with 28 rebounds.
The previous high for rebounds in a game this season was 23 by San Antonio's Victor Wembanyama.
Key Match Events: Sacramento used a fourth-quarter rally to beat the Boston Celtics 114-97.
The score was tied at 76 after three quarters, but Sacramento took command, opening the fourth on a 24-9 run to take a 100-85 lead with 6:03 to play.
Others: DeMar DeRozan added 24 points and 9 assists, and Malik Monk finished with 22 points and 8 assists.
Jaylen Brown led the Celtics with 28 points, Kristaps Porzingis added 22 points and 10 rebounds, and Jayson Tatum had 15 points and 12 rebounds.
